H0.text: what is the word for clarified butter in the balkans and middle east. Ayran

H1.text: what is the word for clarified butter in the balkans and middle east. Ghee

H2.text: what is the word for clarified butter in the balkans and middle east. Roghan

H3.text: what is the word for clarified butter in the balkans and middle east. smen

A4.text: Smen, a salted, fermented clarified butter, widely used in North African and Middle Eastern cuisines

A6.text: In the Sinai Peninsula as well as part of the Levant, samneh is traditionally prepared using a leather bag
